Name: Watercolor Hell
About the game: Watercolor Hell is a wave survival bullet hell focused on evolving base weapons each run. Customize a base wand into a large fire blast that knocks back enemies or a defensive ice razor that shoots down projectiles. Evolve base weapons with meaningful choices that change your run's playstyle. After each run buy upgrades and change your starting weapon. Each time you fully complete a Chapter, your character unlocks new weapons, permeant stacking damage, and other stat bonuses. 33 level upgrade choices to complement the weapon style you're building 8 wand weapon specializations 6 base weapons 9 xp upgrades 10 chapter unlocks A wave survival game with rogue-lite elements.
